description: {"blocks":[{"key":"2837a","text":"Expansion microscopy is a technique to visualize biological structures with higher spatial resolution than traditional microscopy methods.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e9t6s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ea89d","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"66as2","text":"Block cells with 10% (v/v) normal goat serum (NGS) in 0.1% (v/v) Triton X-100 in PBS and incubate it with primary antibodies in blocking solution  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":146,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"d57um","text":"This protocol refers to the expansion microscopy (ExM) protocol described in Asano et al., 2018 with some modifications. ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"CD949B70C4B011EDA8035763EFD73074","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8boo4","text":"After a 3-h incubation with the corresponding secondary antibody (Alexa Fluor, Invitrogen), wash the samples and treat with 0.1 mg/ml Acryloyl-X SE solution (Thermo Scientific) in PBS for   at  . ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":188,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":193,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":10800,"guid":"F2142C90C4B011EDA8035763EFD73074","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"F78414B0C4B011EDA8035763EFD73074","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"e1ivr","text":"The freshly prepared gelling solution consisted of Stock X solution (8.6% (w/v) sodium acrylate 33% (w/v), 2.5% (w/v) acrylamide 50% (w/v), 0.15% (w/v) N,N´-methylenebisacrylamide 2% (w/v), 11.7% (w/v) NaCl 5 M, and PBS 1X), water, 10% (w/v) TEMED and 10% (w/v) APS stock solution in a 47:1:1:1 ratio. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7b85u","text":"Perform gel digestion   in digestion buffer (0.5% (w/v) Triton X-100, 0.2% (v/v) EDTA 0.5 M, pH 8, 5% (v/v) Tris-Cl 1 M, pH 8, 4.67% (w/v) NaCl and 8 U/ml proteinase K). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":22,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"63f8l","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":10800,"guid":"6926A830C4B111EDA8035763EFD73074","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2jt02","text":"Add the gelling solution to each well and covered by a 15-mm coverslip to ensure the formation of a smooth, flat and thin gel. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d6faj","text":"Incubate coverslips for   at   for complete polymerization. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":24,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"B5F9C060C4B211EDA8035763EFD73074","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"B81DB1D0C4B211EDA8035763EFD73074","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5fnc1","text":"Expand the gel in water for   and mount in   poly-L-ornithine-coated coverslips to immobilize the gel for picture acquisition. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":43,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"DDCEBE10C4B211EDA8035763EFD73074","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"10","error":false,"guid":"E3E6F420C4B211EDA8035763EFD73074","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1956}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7gcv7","text":"The following is a variant of the protocol in case of using midbrain organoid sections:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ahu0k","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"qp0b","text":"Fix midbrain organoids and perform immunofluorescence staining as described above. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f99bv","text":"Acquire images using a Leica TCS SP8 confocal microscope (Leica, Germany) equipped with a 100× /1.4 numerical aperture oil-immersion objective. For each condition, acquire 5 images from at least three independent experiments. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"djvm0","text":"Analyze Images using Diffraction PSF 3D, DeconvolutionLab2, and EzColocalization plugins in Fiji-ImageJ. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4jk5f","text":"Use GraphPad Prism version 9.0.0 (RRID:SCR_002798) to calculate Spearman’s rank correlation value (ρ) to identify colocalization of fluorescence signals.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7d5l3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4lm4a","text":"Treat sections with    acryloyl-X SE solution in PBS at     .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":20,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":56,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":59,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fambj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8ihco","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.1","error":false,"guid":"04C36502CC5411EDA1AE0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1798}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.1","error":false,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"04C3661ECC5411EDA1AE0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"4BB70C40CC5411EDA37F0DC2AE9CDC08","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3le01","text":"Acquire images using a Leica TCS SP8 confocal microscope (Leica, Germany) equipped with a 100× /1.4 numerical aperture oil-immersion objective. For each condition, acquire 5 images from at least three independent experiments. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6bmjo","text":"Analyze Images using Diffraction PSF 3D, DeconvolutionLab2, and EzColocalization plugins in Fiji-ImageJ. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"drhpj","text":"Use GraphPad Prism version 9.0.0 (RRID:SCR_002798) to calculate Spearman’s rank correlation value (ρ) to identify colocalization of fluorescence signals.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8ig4","text":"Perform gel digestion and expansion as described above.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dartm","text":"Perform gelation in a 47:1:1:1 ratio of Stock X, 10% (w/v) TEMED, 10% (w/v) APS, and 0.5% (w/v) 4-hydroxy-TEMPO stock solutions. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: Expansion microscopy
